extra.rawValue: Function wait - timeout must be number >= 0.

arguments.value: Function wait - timeout must be number >= 0.

leadingComments.value:
*
 * Converts timeout in a Promise, resolved when specified amount of time passes.
 * @method wait
 * @param {any} v - value should be returned.
 * @param {number} [t = 0] t - amount of time, in millis.
 * @return {Promise<T>}
